last_episode_to_air.name: The Book of the Shadow, Part 2
last_episode_to_air.overview: There's no going back for Heaven anymore, things are already in motion. All she can hope for now is that the foreseen powers will join her.

name: Samurai Girl
overview: Samurai Girl is a six-hour mini-series loosely based on the popular young-adult novel series by Carrie Asai. The event stars Jamie Chung, Brendan Fehr, and Stacy Keibler. The series began its three-day premiere on ABC Family on September 5, 2008.

episodes.name: The Book of the Sword, Part 1
episodes.overview:
The sheltered adopted Heaven, daughter to one of Japan's wealthiest families, grew up in a protected environment, but now she suddenly is in San Francisco and her dad plans to marry her off to the son of one of his business partners.

Heaven learns that her past is linked to an ancient secret prophecy - she finds herself in the middle of the fight between good and evil. Her father hands her the family sword, The Whisper of Death, despite her plea to give it to her brother.

episodes.name: The Book of the Sword, Part 2
episodes.overview: Heaven learns that her past is linked to an ancient secret prophecy - she finds herself in the middle of the fight between good and evil. Her father hands her the family sword, The Whisper of Death, despite her plea to give it to her brother.

episodes.name: The Book of the Heart, Part 1
episodes.overview: Heaven needs the help of her friends to find answers about herself and her past.

episodes.name: The Book of the Heart, Part 2
episodes.overview: Karen, Jake's former fiancee makes a surprise visit.

episodes.name: The Book of the Shadow, Part 1
episodes.overview: Heaven and Severin try to get their hands on the mirror. Meanwhile Karen causes some trouble.

episodes.name: The Book of the Shadow, Part 2
episodes.overview: There's no going back for Heaven anymore, things are already in motion. All she can hope for now is that the foreseen powers will join her.
